instruction: While standing, raise up onto your toes and lift your heels up off the ground.
name: STANDING HEEL RAISE

instruction: Stand in front of a wall. Step forward with one foot and keep your toes on both feet pointing forward. To stretch the gastrocnemius keep the back leg straight during the stretch. To stretch the soleus, bend the back leg slightly.
name: STANDING CALF STRETCH

instruction: Point your toes down and then pull your toes up repeatedly, moving your foot at the ankle joint.
name: ANKLE PUMPS

instruction: While in a seated position write the alphabet with your foot. Your ankle joint should be moving.
name: ANKLE ABCS

instruction: Move your ankle in a circular pattern, in one direction for several repetitions, then repeat in the opposite direction.
name: ANKLE CIRCLES

instruction: While seated, use an elastic band attached to your foot and press your foot downward and forward.
name: ELASTIC BAND: PLANTARFLEXION

instruction: Using an elastic band attached to your foot, hook it under your opposite foot and up to your hand. Move your foot outwards against the elastic band.
name: ELASTIC BAND: EVERSION

instruction: While seated, cross your legs and using the elastic band attached to your foot, hook it under your opposite foot and up to your hand. Move your foot inward against the elastic band.
name: ELASTIC BAND: INVERSION

instruction: While seated, have an elastic band attached to your foot, pull your foot upward against the elastic band.
name: ELASTIC BAND: DORSIFLEXION

instruction: Stand on one leg and maintain your balance.
name: SINGLE LEG STANCE

instruction: Tighten your quad and try to press the back of your knee towards the table.
name: QUAD SETS

instruction: While laying on a table, slide your affected heel towards your butt. Return to the starting position.
name: HEEL SLIDES

instruction: While seated with knees bent, straighten your knee and point your toes up.
name: LONG ARC QUADS

instruction: Place a rolled up towel under your knee and straighten your leg.
name: SHORT ARC QUAD

instruction: While lying on your back, keep the affected knee straight and the unaffected knee bent. Raise the affected leg straight up.
name: STRAIGHT LEG RAISES

instruction: Lay on your side. Keeping your knee straight, raise your top leg to the side in-line with your body.
name: SIDELYING HIP ABDUCTION

instruction: Lay on your side and cross your top leg over the bottom. While keeping the bottom knee straight, lift your leg into the air, in-line with your body.
name: SIDELYING HIP ADDUCTION

instruction: Lay on your stomach. Keep your knee straight and lift your leg off of the table.
name: PRONE HIP EXTENSION

instruction: Lie on your side with your hip and knees bent. Raise your top knee up while keeping both feet in contact with another.
name: SIDELYING CLAMSHELLS

instruction: Lie on your back with knees bent. Squeeze your buttocks and raise your hip into the air.
name: BRIDGE

instruction: While seating, raise your knee straight up into the air. Repeat with the other leg.
name: SEATED MARCHING

instruction: While standing, lift your knee straight up into air. Repeat with the other leg.
name: STANDING MARCHES

instruction: While standing and knees kept straight, bring your leg out to your side.
name: STANDING HIP ABDUCTION

instruction: While stranding with knees straight, bring your leg straight back. Make sure to keep your chest up and not lean forward.
name: STANDING HIP EXTENSION

instruction: Lie on your back with knees bent, and place an elastic band around your knees. Keeping your feet on the ground, bring your knees outward.
name: SUPINE HIP ABDUCTION

instruction: Lie on your back with knees bent. Place a rolled up towel or ball between your legs. Squeeze the object between your knees.
name: SUPINE HIP ADDUCTION

instruction: Stand with your legs shoulder-width apart. Bend your hips and knees as if sitting back into a seat then return to the starting position. Keep your weight on your heels and do not let your knees go in front of your toes.
name: SQUATS

instruction: While lying on your back with knees bent, arch and flatten your back repeatedly.
name: PELVIC TILT

instruction: Slowly pull down with your unaffected arm to raise your affect arm up. Your uaffected arm should be doing all of the work.
name: OVERHEAD PULLEY FLEXION

instruction: Draw your shoulder blades back to get a good squeeze on your scapulae.
name: SCAPULAR SQUEEZES

instruction: Hold the elastic band with both hands the pull the band back while keeping your elbows bent.
name: ELASTIC BAND: ROWS

instruction: Hold an elastic band with the affected arm with your palm up. Keeping your elbow in your side pull the band to the side.
name: ELASTIC BAND: EXTERNAL ROTATION

instruction: Hold an elastic band with the affected arm with palms up. While keeping your elbow to your side, bring the band inward.
name: ELASTIC BAND: INTERNAL ROTATION

instruction: Lie on your back holding a wand or cane. Using your unaffected arm to assist, raise the wand overhead.
name: WAND FLEXION

instruction: Hold the band with both hands and keep your elbows straight. Pull the band straight down to your side.
name: ELASTIC BAND: EXTENSION

instruction: Lie on your back with your arm extended towards the ceiling. Keep your elbow straight and protract your shoulder forward towards the ceiling.
name: SCAPULAR PUNCHES

instruction: While sitting straight, move your shoulders in a circular pattern going up, back, and down.
name: SHOULDER ROLLS

instruction: Lie on your side with your elbow bent tucked into your side. While keeping your elbow bent, move your arm towards the ceiling.
name: SIDELYING EXTERNAL ROTATION

instruction: Lie on your stomach with your arm off the side of the table. Keeping your elbow straight, raise your arm towards your side.
name: PRONE EXTENSION

instruction: Lie on your stomach with your arm hanging off the table. While keeping your elbow straight, raise your arm straight to the side.
name: PRONE HORIZONTAL ABDUCTION

instruction: Keep your elbow straight and use your unaffected hand to bend your affected wrist upwards.
name: WRIST FLEXOR STRETCH

instruction: Keep your elbow straight and use your unaffected hand to bend your affected wrist down.
name: WRIST EXTENSOR STRETCH

instruction: Standing up, bend and straighen your elbow repeatedly.
name: ELBOW FLEXION EXTENSION

instruction: Holding putty in the palm of your hand, squeeze slowly and tightly. Reshape and repeat.
name: PUTTY SQUEEZE

instruction: Using your thumb, alternate touching the tips of your thumb and your fingers. Thumb to pointer, thumb to middle, etc.
name: FINGER TAPS

instruction: Start with an open palm and bend your fingers to a claw hand. Return to an open palm and then to an "L" hand". Return to an open palm and then make a fist. Repeat the series.
name: WRIST TENDON GLIDES

instruction: Using a long object like a hammer and your wrist on a table, rotation your forearm back and forth.
name: WAND PRONATION SUPINATION

instruction: Rest your forearm on a table with a small free-weight in your hand. With your palm face down, bend your wirst up and down.
name: WRIST CURL - EXTENSION

instruction: Rest your forearm on a table with a free-weight in your hand. With your palm facing up, bend your wrist up and down.
name: WRIST CURL - FLEXION

instruction: Place your wrists together in front of your chest and hold.
name: PRAYER STRETCH

instruction: Place a towel on a table in front of you. Flex your fingers and pull the towel towards you.
name: TOWEL SCRUNCH

instruction: With marbles laid out on a towel. Pick up a marble one at a time and place it into your hand. Once your hand is full place them back on the towel.
name: MARBLE PICK-UP

instruction: Laying flat on a table, bring your chin to your chest. Keep the back of your head on the table at all times.
name: SUPINE CHIN TUCK

instruction: While standing straight, bring your neck back until your ears line up with your shoulders.
name: CERVICAL RETRATION
